person.persName: David Short Goodloe (Fayette Co, KY, merchant and trustee of Transy University)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, merchant and university trustee. Kentucky native. Married to Sally Ann Lewis Clay Smith Goodloe in Madison County on December 3, 1835. Father of Speed S. Goodloe, A. W. Goodloe, W. Cassius Goodloe, David L. Goodloe, and Greene Clay Goodloe. Book seller in Fayette County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1850. China merchant in Fayette County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1860. Trustee of Transylvania University in 1865.
